scripts.tunnel: concurrently -k -c auto "npm run --prefix ../template dev -- --port 5173 --strictPort" "npx cloudflared tunnel --protocol http2 --url http://localhost:5173"
scripts.all:foreground: npm run cleanup && npm run --prefix ../template build && concurrently -k -n vite,proxy,tunnel -c auto "npm run --prefix ../template dev -- --port 5173 --strictPort" "node download-server.mjs ../template" "npx cloudflared tunnel --protocol http2 --url http://localhost:3456"
scripts.download: concurrently -k -c auto "node download-server.mjs ../template" "npx cloudflared tunnel --protocol http2 --url http://localhost:3456"
